task.title: Connect Pickup to Volume Potentiometer
task.shortdesc: Solder the pickup wires to the volume potentiometer to send the audio signal into the circuit.

step.cmd: Solder the black hot wire to lug 3 of the volume potentiometer.
Solder the ground wire to the back of the volume potentiometer casing.
step.info: The ground wire is white for 2-conductor pickups, or yellow or green for 4-conductor pickups.

image.alt: Pickup wires connected to volume potentiometer
